name: Earth Child Binder
prerequisiteFormula: @wis_score >= 13 AND (@race:dwarf OR @race:gnome) AND @ability:defensive_training AND @feat:earth_child_style AND @feat:earth_child_topple AND @feat:greater_trip AND @feat:improved_trip AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @ability:stunning_fist#unchained_monk AND @skill:acrobatics >= 9
descriptionText: Even the greatest giants fear your technique.
benefitText: You can trip a creature of the giant subtype no matter its size. While you are using Earth Child Style, when a prone creature of the giant subtype stands up and provokes an attack of opportunity from you, if you make an unarmed strike, you can declare you are making a Stunning Fist attempt after the attack hits. You gain a +4 bonus to the DC of any Stunning Fist effect you deliver in this way.
normalText: You can only trip opponents who are one size category larger than you.
